meanings.sent1: The biocoenoses in the forest include trees, birds, and insects.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the biocoenoses in the ocean to understand marine life.
meanings.sent3: The biocoenoses at the park had a party and invited all the animals.
meanings.sent4: The biocoenoses of the coral reef dance together in harmony.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the biocoenoses of the rainforest is like entering a bustling city of nature.

meanings.definition: The living together of different organisms in a specific environment.
meanings.sent1: The biocoenoses of plants and animals in the desert adapt to the harsh conditions.
meanings.sent2: The biocoenoses of fish and algae in the pond create a balanced ecosystem.
meanings.sent3: The biocoenoses of squirrels and birds in the backyard sometimes argue over food.
meanings.sent4: In the biocoenoses of the meadow, each organism plays a unique role in the community.
meanings.sent5: The biocoenoses of the wetland form a beautiful tapestry of life.
